clinical_history: Follow-up ultrasound for known liver lesion.
technique: Longitudinal, transverse, and oblique views obtained.
findings: Right kidney demonstrates unremarkable, no hydronephrosis.
Left ovary demonstrates mildly thickened morphology.
Thyroid gland shows unremarkable echotexture; no suspicious nodules.
Soft tissue region demonstrates isoechoic without fluid collection.
Uterus appears hyperechoic; endometrial thickness measures 30.72 mm.
Testes are smooth-walled with normal vascularity.
